body:
Hello,

Same problem for me with Visual c++ compiler 15.0 (x64) and gRPC 1.11.0. It works fine in 1.10.0 but impossible to link against the 1.11.0. I tried all the generated libs.

Error LNK2019	unresolved external symbol "public: __cdecl grpc::ServerBuilder::~ServerBuilder(void)" (??1ServerBuilder@grpc@@QEAA@XZ) referenced in function "public: __cdecl sparte::GrpcServer::GrpcServer(class std::shared_ptr<class sparte::ConfigManager> const &,class std::shared_ptr<class sparte::VbsUnitaryFeaturesScheduler> const &,class std::shared_ptr<class sparte::VbsPermanentFeaturesManager> const &)" (??0GrpcServer@sparte@@QEAA@AEBV?$shared_ptr@VConfigManager@sparte@@@std@@AEBV?$shared_ptr@VVbsUnitaryFeaturesScheduler@sparte@@@3@AEBV?$shared_ptr@VVbsPermanentFeaturesManager@sparte@@@3@@Z)

Error LNK2019	unresolved external symbol "public: class std::unique_ptr<class grpc::Server,struct std::default_delete<class grpc::Server> > __cdecl grpc::ServerBuilder::BuildAndStart(void)" (?BuildAndStart@ServerBuilder@grpc@@QEAA?AV?$unique_ptr@VServer@grpc@@U?$default_delete@VServer@grpc@@@std@@@std@@XZ) referenced in function "public: __cdecl sparte::GrpcServer::GrpcServer(class std::shared_ptr<class sparte::ConfigManager> const &,class std::shared_ptr<class sparte::VbsUnitaryFeaturesScheduler> const &,class std::shared_ptr<class sparte::VbsPermanentFeaturesManager> const &)" (??0GrpcServer@sparte@@QEAA@AEBV?$shared_ptr@VConfigManager@sparte@@@std@@AEBV?$shared_ptr@VVbsUnitaryFeaturesScheduler@sparte@@@3@AEBV?$shared_ptr@VVbsPermanentFeaturesManager@sparte@@@3@@Z)

For 1.10.0, I link with the libs below and it works without problem.
gpr.lib
grpc_unsecure.lib
grpc++_unsecure.lib
grpc++_cronet.lib
grpc++_error_details.lib
grpc++_reflection.lib
libprotobufd.lib
libprotobuf-lited.lib
libprotocd.lib
zlibstaticd.lib

It doesn't work with these libs for 1.11.0 and I tried all the others.
